column1: Little Goat Diner////I met for a business lunch at the Little Goat this week.  What a great place!  I had the Tuna Melt and it was out of this world.  Open faced
column3: this plate was not only tasty
column4: but I didn't walk away feeling like I over ate.  And
column5: yes I did eat the WHOLE THING!  A very bright and open concept environment
